Name: Ascent
checklistText:
ASCENT CHECKLIST

1. Verify platform alignment: FDAI should indicate roll offset for trajectory azimuth
2. T -10 seconds: Verify Computer is in ASC and not running
3. Ignition
4. Monitor ENGINE I (2) lt: 
	RED on pressure buildup
	OFF on nominal thrust
5. Monitor ENGINE II lt:
	AMBER: ready
6. Liftoff: Monitor computer start & clocks are running
7. Monitor FUEL 1 OXID
8. Monitor ALTITIDE
	Abort Mode I: < 15,000 FEET
	Abort Mode I-II: 15,000 TO 75,000 FEET
	Abort Mode II: 75,000 TO 522,000 FEET
	Abort Mode III: ABOVE 522,000 FEET
	Stowe D-Ring: 75,000 FEET
9. When FUEL 1 OXID depleted, staging.
10. Monitor ENGINE II lt:
	RED on pressure buildup
	OFF on nominal thrust
11. Monitor FUEL 2 OXID
12. Wait for SECO and Insertion
13. On insertion:
	SPCT SEP - PUSH
	JETT FAIRING - PUSH

Complete checklist: Enable OAMS and "zero" IVIs.
Note: It might not be possible to fully zero the IVIs. Do as best as you can, but don't force it.
